resources.string: 1) You Can Now Order Brand New/Used Text Books, Note books, Novels, Stationary Items, Educational Instruments/Equipments, Office Supplies At Your Finger Tips!
2) For All U.G And P.G Courses
Including: B.E, Diploma, B.Sc, Medical, Dental, LLB, M.Sc, M.Tech etc.
Commerce Courses Including B.A, B.Com, BBM, BBA, B.Ed, M.Com, M.B.A, C.A, etc.
Guides, Scanners , Aptitude And Competitive Books Also Available For All The Above Courses.

1) To Place An Order Either Write Down Your Oder On A Piece Of Paper And Upload It On The App,
Or Just Simply Fill In Your Order Via Text By Clicking On The Plus Icon.

2) A Quick Confirmation Call/Sms Will Be Made To You Once Your Oder Has Been Placed, The Price Of
The Order Including The Delivery Charges Will Be Confirmed With You Then.
3) All The Items Will Be Available For A Discounted Price.
Address : 68/1 Concord Plaza Ground Floor, Coles Road, Frazer Town. Bangalore 560005
